author: archiron
body:
#### PR description:

add some modifications in order to have histo with extended eta range from [-2.5, 2.5] to [-3.0, 3.0] to see improvement of electrons reco efficiency in the high eta region for Run3..
Modifications are made on the following files :
Validation/RecoEgamma/plugins/ElectronMcSignalPostValidator.cc Validation/RecoEgamma/plugins/ElectronMcSignalValidator.cc 
Validation/RecoEgamma/plugins/ElectronMcSignalValidator.h 

Validation/RecoEgamma/python/ElectronMcSignalValidator_gedGsfElectrons_cfi.py

Some other small (they do not concern the extended eta range) modifications are made on :
Validation/RecoEgamma/test/ElectronMcSignalValidation_gedGsfElectrons_cfg.py Validation/RecoEgamma/test/ElectronMcSignalPostValidation_cfg.py Validation/RecoEgamma/test/electronValidationCheck_Env.py 

This can be viewed with the following pictures:
![h_mc_Eta_matched](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/167890450-62fdb19b-37aa-4d19-8676-cdffc8b308a5.GIF)
actual eta_matched picture

![h_mc_Eta_Extended_matched](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/167890656-b5e22d2a-76a2-4412-b69e-6a771c3a8d53.GIF)
same picture with extended eta range
![h_ele_EoPVsEta_pfx](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/167890858-b8027e3a-b186-4d16-bd35-6d69bcd98322.GIF)
actual EoPVsEta_pfx picture
![h_ele_EoPVsEtaExtended_pfx](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/167890954-812cd065-90f8-40d1-9be4-263f096e94d4.GIF)
same with extended eta range

The diagonal text is only here because there is no previous reference for the "extended range" histos.

#### PR validation:

compilation is OK, basics tests (scram b runtests or local tests) are OK too.
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos tests are fine
@beaudett @swagata87
